entry.summary: Ever heard of favicons made with SVG? If you are a regular reader of CSS-Tricks, you probably have. But does your website actually use one? entry.title: An Alternative Voice UI To Voice Assistants
entry.summary: Voice assistants are currently the most popular use case for voice user interfaces.
